title: So my friend got banned
body: My friend got banned because he wrote knit yourself u know what i mean and the n word and he told them to me as a joke and turns out someone actually reported him and he got banned so i'm asking if it's possible to get him unbanned because it was directed to me as a joke.Is there anything you can do?

replies.body: There was once a case where Riot unbanned because literally everyone on his team made a forum post saying that they retract their reports if I recall correctly, however you have to realize that when playing with random people that you don't know what those people are going through and they may not want to see communications like that.
Okay so i reported him and i want to retract it because it was as a joke and i didn't really think he would get banned and i really feel bad because hes spent like 600$ on the game

YOU reported him?

Not a great friend.
It was meant as a joke to scare him i didn't really think he was gonna get banned
He wouldn't know if you reported him or not.  Could had just say you did and not actually do it...  Not so funny now huh?
Nah were on skype trying to figure it out hes not mad or anything he knows it was a joke
If you're on Skype why type it?
We were on skype after the game

Make a support ticket and see if they can do anything. I don't know that they can help you without the other 3-8 people that heard the conversation, but perhaps if you are the only one that reported him then they might be willing to help you.

Keep in mind they are not obligated to do this for you and be as polite as possible.

You did the right thing, man.

Friend or foe, gotta report stuff like that.

It's the lawful good thing to do.

> he wrote knit yourself

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/wuv6NyR1-kys-kill-yourself-stop-making-other-bs-assumption-to-suspended-players

Like seriously, at what certain point of time do people make stupid excuses like this...
No you don't get it it's what you think it is i just wrote it like that because i din't think the real version would be allowed

dont tink your friend is going to get out of this one.

It's like your friend stabbed u with a knife n u reported him to the police and you didn't believe he would get arrested.

Here is where things get sticky, because if you didn't report him he probably wouldn't be arrested. But if the police investigated and discovered you didn't report him you could be charged for abetting a crime.

In any case dont bother escalating it because unlikely anything will happen as he made 3 other people see the phrase. In other words, you did the objectively correct thing to report him and the punishment was warranted.

Yeah even if it was a joke to a friend, you are not alone and maybe some of your teammates reported him too.
In any case he should not have wrote that, joke or not he'll stay banned.

Doesn't work that way.
Tell your friend that words have consequences. Regardless if it's a joke.
if you are going to use offensive jokes such as k.y.s then do it on discord or skype the other people in the game dont need to hear it. and you cannot get unbanned
He didn't have skype because he turned it off because of bad net
